Pocket Casts Bulk Operations Tool

This tool makes it dead easy to perform bulk actions - subscribing and unsubscribing to podcasts - with Pocket Casts.

This is a third-party tool and not created or endorsed by the Pocket Casts team. All source code of this tool is freely availible for you to evaluate and audit on your own.
